title: Try you darndest to keep your MMR up
body:
I've been messing around a bit, playing any role, and using champs I normally wouldn't.

Anyway, so I lost enough games that I'm playing with Silvers and low Golds.

Do not make the mistake I did - take care of your MMR so you never have to visit the pits of Silver and low Gold, ever.

Had a Malphite run under enemy Veigar's turret from behind, but took the turret when the last enemy minion was dying literally two pixels away. Like, he genuinely had no idea that, if he waits, the minions will take aggro and allow us to execute better. No, it wasn't 3-4 item Malph. It was 1.5 item jungle Malph.

Also had an Ali who chased from our outer bot turret to their Red, trying to get his stun proc off. It did not dawn on him that, when you chase, you will eventually get collapsed upon.

It's a place where Support mains don't change their trinkets to Sweeper. ADCs will rush Bloodthirsters. Shutdown gold is given away for meaningless kills. Jungles will jump into 5v1, trying to assasinate someone, die - especially when Baron is up.

There is zero macro. They don't get what the hell it even is. DO NOT ROTATE WITH BOT. YOU JUST END UP HAVING THREE AT BOT, CONFUSING THE SHIT OUT OF EACH OTHER.

Take care of that MMR. Nurture it, value it. Do not visit the twilight zone that is Silver/Gold.
